name: AddDashboardsToList
description:
Add dashboards to an existing list in Datadog.

Use this tool to append dashboards to a specified existing dashboard list in Datadog. Ideal for organizing and managing dashboards effectively.

parameters.name: dashboard_list_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the integer ID of the dashboard list where dashboards will be added.

value_schema.description: ID of the dashboard list to add items to.

parameters.name: dashboards_to_add
parameters.description: A JSON array of dashboards. Each dashboard should include an 'id' and a 'type'.

dashboards.description: List of dashboards to add the dashboard list.

value_schema.description: Dashboards to add to the dashboard list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: dashboard_list_id
parameters.description: ID of the dashboard list to add items to.

value_schema.description: ID of the dashboard list to add items to.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Dashboards to add to the dashboard list.

dashboards.description: List of dashboards to add the dashboard list.

value_schema.description: Dashboards to add to the dashboard list.
